name: dma-web
description: My boilerplate for creating new web projects with [Gulp.js](http://gulpjs.com/). Forked from [Todd Motto's GulpOSS](https://github.com/toddmotto/gulp-oss) with some additions from [Mark Goodyear and Big Bite Creative](https://github.com/bigbitecreative/base) and various tutorials around the web.
